(iter (repeat 11)
(for u = (make-next-unit *q* rng))
(for (values ocr occ) = (cell-row-col (unit-initial-position u (game-map *q*))))
(for (values ncr ncc) = (cell-row-col (unit-initial-position-v2 u (game-map *q*))))
(collect (list u (list ocr occ) (list ncr ncc)))))
